title: How much are you willing to spend on a reptile?
Snakes are the most common pet reptiles, are you scared of snakes?
How much time do you have in a day to spend time with or play with your reptile?
Do you dislike reptiles that jump high or can stick to your clothes?
Do you want a reptile that is traditionally more 'cool' or 'cute'?
Do you want a reptile that is easy to care for or is a higher maintenance one ok?
